# Varun Manoj Kumar

> Self Motivated visually challenged (low vision) with a passion for accessibility and innovation. With over 2 years experience at Deloitte USI, Currently working as an Associate Analyst in Workday Integrations and Reporting, certified in Workday Finance Integration and Prism Analytics . I enjoy learning new skills and applying them to create user experiences Inclusive for All with Technology.

## Main

### Varun Manoj Kumar

Source: [https://varunmanojkumar.in/](https://varunmanojkumar.in/)

# **Varun Manoj Kumar!**

Self Motivated visually challenged (low vision) **MCA Graduate** with a passion for accessibility and innovation. With over 2 years experience at **Deloitte USI**, currently working as an **Associate Analyst** in Workday Integrations and Reporting, certified in Workday Finance Integration and Prism Analytics . I am enthusiastic about Learning new skills and applying them to create inclusive experiences through Technology

* [ ](https://www.linkedin.com/in/varun-manoj-kumar/)
* [ ](https://github.com/Varunmanoj)
* [ ](https://www.instagram.com/varunmanojkumar7/)

![Varun Manoj Kumar Logo ](assets/img/Varun%20Profesional%20photo.webp)

## **Experience**

![Deloitte Logo](assets/img/Deloitte%20Logo%20Black.webp) 

### Deloitte Consulting

Associate Analyst

July 2023 - Present 

Certified in **Workday Finance Integrations** after completing extensive training. 

#### Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (MLH)

Contributed to MLH's integration development and go-live activities by scheduling integrations and resolving technical tickets. Developed payroll integrations, conducted regression testing for critical updates, and collaborated on reporting and impact analysis. Enhanced skills through ongoing training and teamwork.

#### KeHE Distributors (KEHE)

Focused on resolving reporting challenges issues for KEHE. Delivered custom solutions for payment processing, built new reports, and optimized data management. Ensured seamless operations by addressing integration and reporting needs. 

#### Avangrid.inc

Contributed to a project with a leading American company that focuses on clean and sustainable energy solutions using electric, natural gas, and renewable sources. As a team member I have successfully resolved 800+ tickets till date and thereby contribute about 8% of the team‚Äôs daily workload. I have resolved data inconsistencies to mitigate billing/customer service issues in AMI Meters.

![Aadi Infotech Logo](assets/img/Adi-infotech-.webp) 

### Aadi Infotech

Internship

May 2022 - June 2022 

[View Certificate](https://resources.portfolio.varunmanojkumar.in/Varun-Manoj-Kumar-Aadi-Infotech-internship-Certificate.pdf)

#### India City Trivia

Aadi Infotech is an AI based Cloud Technology Solutions Provider that provides services that help in Integrating a Business with the latest cloud services to automate the daily tasks and stay ahead of the rest. Explore cloud-based solutions that combine powerful infrastructure choices, a robust development platform and industry-leading services.  
  
I worked for Aadi Infotech for a short internship and explored AI based Voice Assistants like Alexa and developed an Alexa Skill Game ‚ÄòIndia City Trivia‚Äô

![e-Stone Technology Logo](assets/img/Estone.webp) 

### e-Stone Technology

Internship

April 2022 - June 2022 

[View Certificate](https://resources.portfolio.varunmanojkumar.in/Varun-Manoj-E-Stone-Technology-certificate.pdf)

#### Word Puzzle Game ‚ÄòWordZzle‚Äô

e-Stone Information Technology is an IT Technology Solution Consultancy offering entire spectrum of IT solutions & services based in Mumbai and New York. The clientele include NEC, Tata Power, Tata Advanced Systems Limited, Netmagic, NTT Data, GST Network, National Project Implementation Unit (unit of Ministry of HRD), Cox & Kings etc.  
  
As part of my summer internship, I worked as an Android App Developer for this company and developed a Word Puzzle Game ‚ÄòWordZzle‚Äô

![Microsoft Logo](assets/img/Microsoft-Logo--e1666769472451.webp) 

### Future Ready Talent

Internship

October 2021 - Jan 2022 

[View Certificate](https://resources.portfolio.varunmanojkumar.in/Varun%20Manoj%20Kumar%20Future%20Ready%20Talent%20Internship%20Certificate.pdf)

#### Here 2 Help

Future Ready Talent is a virtual internship platform with an opportunity to learn the in- demand azure cloud & security skills aligned to industry needs. The program aims at  
  
preparing learners work towards solving business challenges and creating innovative solutions using the power of Microsoft Azure & GitHub tools. This internship is learn- apply-implement based.   
  
As part of the Virtual Internship, I built an Al based ChatBot which provides answers for FAQs for a demo college website - '#Here2Help'

## **Projects**

![Battery % Viewer Low Vision Logo](assets/img/Battery%20Viewer%20-%20Low%20Vision.png) 

# **Battery % Viewer- Low Vision**

Developed my first Android App (Battery % Viewer) to display phone battery percentage and published on Google Play and Amazon App Store.  
  
Also built companion Desktop App both Mac and Windows

[Learn More ](Projects/Battery-Percent-Viewer-Low-Vision.html) 

![St. Xavier's College Canteen Logo ](assets/img/Canteen-Website.webp) 

# **St. Xavier's College Canteen**

Developed a Website and QR code for College Canteen Menu in order to help students with disability to read the menu currently displayed on boards

[Learn More ](Projects/St-Xavier-College-Canteen.html) 

![MinsArt Website Logo](assets/img/Minsart%20Website-Preview.webp) 

# **MintsArt Creative & Colourful Hand-painted Decor For Your Home**

Developed an eCommerce website that offers products in multiple categories using WordPress. Integrated with RazorPay Payment Gateway and Google Analytics.

[Learn More ](Projects/Mintsart-E-Commerce-Website.html) 

[View more ](Project.html)

## **Education**

![St. Xavier's College Logo](assets/img/St.%20Xavier%27s%20College%20Logo.webp) 

### St Xavier's College

BSc-IT

July 2020 - May 2023 

Undergraduate in Bachelors Degree in Information Technology

* Received the **Best Performer Award** from HOD.
* Built and Deployed Android App on Google and Amazon App Store.
* Volunteered at **XRCVC** to convert Text Books to accessible Formats (EPUB)
* Appointed as the Lead Maintaining Accessibility Standards of St. Xavier‚Äôs **Malhar 2021 website** (College Annual Festival)
* Built an **E-Library Management System** for XRCVC to mange accessible Books offered by XRCVC to Students

![Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham](assets/img/Amritha%20Ahead%20Online.svg) 

### Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham

MCA

October 2023 - Oct 2025 

Postgraduate Degree in Masters of Computer Applications

* Built a Portfolio website to showcase my Projects and achievements.
* Built a PWA utility tool to Effortlessly convert all 4US time zones to IST with accurate 12-hour results! and published to the **Google Play store and Microsoft Store**
* Completed the **Meta Backend Developer Professional Certificate** on Coursera and developed a prototype of a Restaurant booking and Menu website using **Django Rest Framework**.
